00020 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_SAT_CLAUSE_H
00021 #define CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_SAT_CLAUSE_H
00022 
00023 #include <vector>
00024 
00025 template<typename VarArray>
00026 struct BoolOrConstraintDynamic : public AbstractConstraint
00027 {
00028   typedef typename VarArray::value_type VarRef;
00029 
00030   virtual string constraint_name()
00031   { return "BoolOr"; }
00032   
00033   VarArray var_array;
00034   vector<int> negs; //negs[i]==0 iff var_array[i] is negated, NB. this
00035             //is also the value that must be watched
00036   size_t no_vars;
00037   int watched[2];
00038   int last;
00039 
00040   BoolOrConstraintDynamic(StateObj* _stateObj, const VarArray& _var_array,
00041                    const vector<int>& _negs) :
00042     AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), var_array(_var_array), negs(_negs), last(0)
00043   { 
00044     watched[0] = watched[1] = -2;
00045     no_vars = _var_array.size();
00046 #ifndef WATCHEDLITERALS
00047     cerr << "This almost certainly isn't going to work... sorry" << endl;
00048 #endif
00049   }
00050   
00051   int dynamic_trigger_count()
00052   {
00053     return 2;
00054   }
00055 
00056   virtual void full_propagate()
00057   {
00058     DynamicTrigger* dt = dynamic_trigger_start();
00059     int found = 0; //num literals that can be T found so far
00060     int first_found = -1;
00061     int next_found = -1;
00062     for(int i = 0; i < no_vars; i++) {
00063       if(var_array[i].inDomain(negs[i])) { //can literal be T?
00064         found++;
00065         if(found == 1) 
00066           first_found = i;
00067         else {
00068           next_found = i;
00069           break;
00070         }
00071       }
00072     }
00073     if(found == 0) {
00074       getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00075       return;
00076     }
00077     if(found == 1) { //detect unit clause
00078       var_array[first_found].propagateAssign(negs[first_found]);
00079       return; //don't bother placing any watches on unit clause
00080     }
00081     //not failed or unit, place watches
00082     var_array[first_found].addDynamicTrigger(dt, DomainRemoval, negs[first_found]);
00083     dt->trigger_info() = first_found;
00084     watched[0] = first_found;
00085     dt++;
00086     var_array[next_found].addDynamicTrigger(dt, DomainRemoval, negs[next_found]);
00087     dt->trigger_info() = next_found;
00088     watched[1] = next_found;
00089   }
00090 
00091   virtual void propagate(DynamicTrigger* dt)
00092   {
00093     size_t prev_var = dt->trigger_info();
00094     size_t other_var = watched[0] == prev_var ? watched[1] : watched[0];
00095     for(int i = 1; i < no_vars; i++) {
00096       size_t j = (last + i) % no_vars;
00097       VarRef& v = var_array[j];
00098       int neg = negs[j];
00099       if(j != other_var && v.inDomain(neg)) {
00100     v.addDynamicTrigger(dt, DomainRemoval, neg);
00101     dt->trigger_info() = j;
00102     last = j;
00103     watched[watched[0] == prev_var ? 0 : 1] = j;
00104     return;
00105       } 
00106     }
00107     //if we get here, we couldn't find a place to put the watch, do UP
00108     var_array[other_var].propagateAssign(negs[other_var]);
00109   }
00110 
00111   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00112   {
00113     for(int i = 0; i < no_vars; i++)
00114       if(v[i] == negs[i])
00115         return true;
00116     return false;
00117   }
00118   
00119   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00120   { 
00121     vector<AnyVarRef> vars;
00122     vars.reserve(no_vars);
00123     for(unsigned i = 0; i < no_vars; ++i)
00124       vars.push_back(AnyVarRef(var_array[i]));
00125     return vars;  
00126   }
00127   
00128   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00129   {
00130     for(int i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00131     {
00132       if(var_array[i].inDomain(negs[i]))
00133       {
00134         assignment.push_back(make_pair(i, negs[i]));
00135         return true;
00136       }
00137     }
00138     return false;
00139   }
00140 };
00141 
00142 template<typename T>
00143 inline AbstractConstraint*
00144 BuildCT_WATCHED_OR(StateObj* stateObj, const vector<T>& vs, ConstraintBlob& bl)
00145 {
00146   size_t vs_s = vs.size();
00147   for(int i = 0; i < vs_s; i++)
00148     if(vs[i].getInitialMin() != 0 || vs[i].getInitialMax() != 1)
00149     {
00150       FAIL_EXIT("watched or only works on Boolean variables!");
00151     }
00152     
00153   return new BoolOrConstraintDynamic<vector<T> >(stateObj, vs, bl.negs);
00154 }
00155 
00156 #endif
